path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Meta Hangry Games Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.MHG: Experiments/contracts/Meta Hangry Games Full Smart Contract Security Audit/MHG

findings.title: Owner can change marketing, preseller, team and burn wallets
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to modify critical wallet settings, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can change trading status
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the trading status of the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to sell to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens to sell and add to liquidity, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount and maximum wallet token
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify maximum transaction amount and maximum wallet token, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can manually swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to manually swap and liquify tokens, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can manually call _fees_to_bnb function with wrapper
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to manually call the _fees_to_bnb function with a wrapper, which may lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can change sell multiplier
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the sell multiplier, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change fees, fee limits and fee minimum balances
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify fees, fee limits, and fee minimum balances without restrictions.
